body:has(message-banner dialog[open]) #ramble-banner[data-astro-cid-442kbb46] { display: none !important; }

.ramble-banner[data-astro-cid-442kbb46] { --box-highlight-background: var(--red-100); position: static; border: none; padding: 0px; max-inline-size: unset; inline-size: 100%; }

.ramble-banner[data-astro-cid-442kbb46] aside > div { color: var(--red-600); }

.ramble-banner[data-astro-cid-442kbb46] a[data-astro-cid-442kbb46] { color: var(--red-600); text-decoration: underline; }

.dialog[data-astro-cid-gfjfkzko] { position: static; max-inline-size: 1088px; padding: var(--space-8) var(--space-12); }

.dialog[data-astro-cid-gfjfkzko] > form[data-astro-cid-gfjfkzko] { display: flex; align-items: center; text-align: center; gap: var(--space-12); }

.dialog[data-astro-cid-gfjfkzko] > form[data-astro-cid-gfjfkzko] button[data-astro-cid-gfjfkzko] { flex-shrink: 0; }

@keyframes astroFadeInOut { 
  0% { opacity: 1; }
  100% { opacity: 0; }
}

@keyframes astroFadeIn { 
  0% { opacity: 0; mix-blend-mode: plus-lighter; }
  100% { opacity: 1; mix-blend-mode: plus-lighter; }
}

@keyframes astroFadeOut { 
  0% { opacity: 1; mix-blend-mode: plus-lighter; }
  100% { opacity: 0; mix-blend-mode: plus-lighter; }
}

@keyframes astroSlideFromRight { 
  0% { transform: translate(100%); }
}

@keyframes astroSlideFromLeft { 
  0% { transform: translate(-100%); }
}

@keyframes astroSlideToRight { 
  100% { transform: translate(100%); }
}

@keyframes astroSlideToLeft { 
  100% { transform: translate(-100%); }
}

@media (prefers-reduced-motion) {
  ::view-transition-group(*), ::view-transition-old(*), ::view-transition-new(*) { animation: auto ease 0s 1 normal none running none !important; }
  [data-astro-transition-scope] { animation: auto ease 0s 1 normal none running none !important; }

shiny-shimmer-button[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm] { --ease-up: linear(0, .941 11.2%, 1.203 18.3%, 1.196 22.7%, .962 40.7%, 1.007 62.9%, 1); --duration-up: .5s; --ease-hover: linear(0, .804 19.5%, 1.02 29.6%, 1.054 38.2%, 1.001 64.3%, 1); --duration-hover: .3s; --ease-down: cubic-bezier(.3, .7, .3, 1); --duration-down: .15s; --shadow-size: 6px; display: inline-flex; position: relative; padding-block-end: var(--shadow-size); min-inline-size: var(--shiny-shimmer-button-min-inline-size, initial); --shadow-texture-left: 10px; --shadow-texture-right-offset: 53px; --shadow-position-top: 50%; --active-transform-down: 5px; --hover-transform-down: 2.5px; }

shiny-shimmer-button[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm]:has(.button:hover) { --shadow-texture-left: 12px; --shadow-texture-right-offset: 51px; }

shiny-shimmer-button[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm].sm { --hover-transform-down: 1px; --active-transform-down: 2.5px; --shadow-position-top: 45%; }

.button[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm] { --background-color-onhover: var(--background-color); --button-gap: 0; transition-property: transform; transition-duration: var(--duration-up); transition-timing-function: var(--ease-up); position: relative; overflow: hidden; inline-size: stretch; z-index: 1; will-change: transform; mask-image: radial-gradient(rgb(255, 255, 255), rgb(0, 0, 0)); }

.button[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm]:hover { transition-timing-function: var(--ease-hover); transition-duration: var(--duration-hover); transform: translateY(var(--hover-transform-down)); }

.button[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm]:hover > svg[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm]:not(.shine) { transition-timing-function: var(--ease-hover); transition-duration: var(--duration-hover); transform: translate(-2px, 3px); }

.button[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm]:active:not(.disabled, [aria-pressed="true"]) { transition-duration: var(--duration-down); transition-timing-function: var(--ease-down); transform: translateY(var(--active-transform-down)); }

.button[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm]:active:not(.disabled, [aria-pressed="true"]) .circle[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm] { --scale: 1; }

.circle[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm] { --scale: 0; border-radius: 999px; background-color: rgb(238, 100, 73); width: 110%; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; position: absolute; z-index: 3; filter: blur(12px); transform: scale(var(--scale)); transition-duration: var(--duration-down); transition-timing-function: var(--ease-down); transform-origin: center center; }

.shadow[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm] { position: absolute; top: var(--shadow-position-top); left: 0px; inline-size: 100%; block-size: 50%; border-radius: 13px; z-index: 0; overflow: hidden; background: var(--red-400); }

.shadow[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm]::after { content: ""; display: block; position: absolute; left: var(--shadow-texture-left); bottom: 0px; block-size: 20px; inline-size: calc(100% - var(--shadow-texture-left) - var(--shadow-texture-right-offset)); background: var(--red-400); box-shadow: var(--red-200) 0 0 18px; transition-timing-function: var(--ease-hover); transition-duration: var(--duration-hover); }

svg[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm].glareLeft, svg[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm].glareRight { position: absolute; color: var(--background-color); filter: drop-shadow(rgb(238, 100, 73) 8px 8px 6px); inline-size: 166px; block-size: 65px; }

svg[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm].glareLeft { left: -125px; top: -13px; z-index: 1; }

svg[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm].glareRight { right: -64px; bottom: 0px; z-index: 0; }

svg[data-astro-cid-om27h5hm].shine { inline-size: 218px; block-size: 84px; position: absolute; left: 0px; transform: translate(-100%); filter: blur(6px); }
